# Validate all hidden states
import torch

print(f"\nValidating {len(hidden_states)} layer outputs...")

for i, hidden in enumerate(hidden_states):
    # Check shape
    assert len(hidden.shape) >= 2, f"Layer {i}: Expected at least 2D tensor"
    
    # Check for NaN/Inf
    assert not torch.isnan(hidden).any(), f"Layer {i}: Contains NaN"
    assert not torch.isinf(hidden).any(), f"Layer {i}: Contains Inf"
    
    # Check reasonable values
    max_val = hidden.abs().max().item()
    assert max_val < 10000, f"Layer {i}: Values too large ({max_val})"
    
    if i == 0 or i == n_layers - 1 or i == n_layers // 2:
        print(f"  Layer {i}: shape={hidden.shape}, max={max_val:.2f}")

# Check shapes are consistent
shapes = [h.shape for h in hidden_states]
hidden_dim = shapes[0][-1]
for i, shape in enumerate(shapes):
    assert shape[-1] == hidden_dim, f"Layer {i}: Inconsistent hidden dim"

print(f"\nAll {n_layers} layers validated!")
print(f"Hidden dimension: {hidden_dim}")

print("\n" + "=" * 40)
print("HIDDEN STATES " + "TEST PASSED")
print("=" * 40)

# Run basic trace
prompt = "The quick brown fox"
print(f"Running trace on: '{prompt}'")

start = time.time()
with model.trace(prompt, remote=True):
    # Access first layer hidden state
    # Different models have different layer accessors
    if hasattr(model.model, 'layers'):
        # Llama, Mistral, Qwen style
        hidden = model.model.layers[0].output[0].save()
    elif hasattr(model, 'transformer') and hasattr(model.transformer, 'h'):
        # GPT-2, GPT-J style
        hidden = model.transformer.h[0].output[0].save()
    elif hasattr(model, 'gpt_neox'):
        # GPT-NeoX, Pythia style
        hidden = model.gpt_neox.layers[0].output[0].save()
    else:
        raise ValueError(f"Unknown model architecture for {MODEL_NAME}")

trace_time = time.time() - start
print(f"Trace completed in {trace_time:.1f}s")

# Detect model architecture and get layers
def get_layers_accessor(model):
    """Get the layers accessor for different model architectures."""
    if hasattr(model.model, 'layers'):
        # Llama, Mistral, Qwen, Gemma style
        return model.model.layers
    elif hasattr(model, 'transformer') and hasattr(model.transformer, 'h'):
        # GPT-2, GPT-J style
        return model.transformer.h
    elif hasattr(model, 'gpt_neox') and hasattr(model.gpt_neox, 'layers'):
        # GPT-NeoX, Pythia style
        return model.gpt_neox.layers
    else:
        raise ValueError(f"Unknown model architecture")

def get_num_layers(model):
    """Get number of layers from model config."""
    config = model.config
    if hasattr(config, 'num_hidden_layers'):
        return config.num_hidden_layers
    elif hasattr(config, 'n_layer'):
        return config.n_layer
    elif hasattr(config, 'n_layers'):
        return config.n_layers
    else:
        raise ValueError("Cannot determine number of layers")

layers = get_layers_accessor(model)
n_layers = get_num_layers(model)
print(f"Model has {n_layers} layers")

import torch

print(f"\nValidating {len(hidden_states)} layer outputs...")

for i, hidden in enumerate(hidden_states):
    # Check shape
    assert len(hidden.shape) >= 2, f"Layer {i}: Expected at least 2D tensor"
    
    # Check for NaN/Inf
    assert not torch.isnan(hidden).any(), f"Layer {i}: Contains NaN"
    assert not torch.isinf(hidden).any(), f"Layer {i}: Contains Inf"
    
    # Check reasonable values
    max_val = hidden.abs().max().item()
    assert max_val < 10000, f"Layer {i}: Values too large ({max_val})"
    
    if i == 0 or i == n_layers - 1 or i == n_layers // 2:

# Check shapes are consistent

print(f"\nAll {n_layers} layers validated!")

print("\n" + "=" * 40)
print("HIDDEN STATES " + "TEST PASSED")
print("=" * 40)

# Detect model architecture and get layers
def get_layers_accessor(model):
    """Get the layers accessor for different model architectures."""
    if hasattr(model.model, 'layers'):
        # Llama, Mistral, Qwen, Gemma style
        return model.model.layers
    elif hasattr(model, 'transformer') and hasattr(model.transformer, 'h'):
        # GPT-2, GPT-J style
        return model.transformer.h
    elif hasattr(model, 'gpt_neox') and hasattr(model.gpt_neox, 'layers'):
        # GPT-NeoX, Pythia style
        return model.gpt_neox.layers
    else:
        raise ValueError(f"Unknown model architecture")

def get_num_layers(model):
    """Get number of layers from model config."""
    config = model.config
    if hasattr(config, 'num_hidden_layers'):
        return config.num_hidden_layers
    elif hasattr(config, 'n_layer'):
        return config.n_layer
    elif hasattr(config, 'n_layers'):
        return config.n_layers
    else:
        raise ValueError("Cannot determine number of layers")

layers = get_layers_accessor(model)
n_layers = get_num_layers(model)
print(f"Model has {n_layers} layers")
